_header: Sanctus Beda was I-boren here on Britain mid us
Subjects: complaints; Venerable Bede; Alcuin of York
_description: Alliterative lines complaining of William the Conqueror’s foreign prelates — 18 lines

WorcF174.First Lines:
Sanctus beda was iboren her on bretone mid usþe
                    wisliche…apende þe þeo englise leoden þurh
                    þere…
WorcF174.Last Lines:
beoþ godes word to worlde asende þe we sceolen faeler
                    feþ…
